content: this easy crochet bath mat pattern makes a soft and squishy crochet bath mat it is a simple and quick bathmat pattern that is customizable and has a built-in border enhance your bathroom or kitchen or any room in your house with this crochet mat about this crochet mat - this pattern is worked with two strands of yarn held together for the entire pattern using two strands held together creates a squishy dense fabric that is perfect for a crochet bath mat - you can use any size 4 medium yarn so you can choose any color that matches your home decor - the pattern creates a crochet bath mat that is approx 20″ wide and 30″ high the average size of a bathmat the pattern includes instructions on how to adjust the size - make this mat for your bathroom kitchen or any room in your house
